Version 2.0.86 - Fix Resume Correction & Faster Vendor Position Detection

Bug Fixes

  • Fix Captivate resume: always set Object.defineProperty traps (even when localStorage is empty) and compute furthestSlide from score.raw/lesson_location in the trap before wrapping — ensures backing store is corrected before content reads suspend_data
  • Captivate reads suspend_data from pre-populated data model BEFORE calling LMSInitialize, so the LMSInitialize wrapper (v2.0.85) fires too late — the trap fires the instant the API is created

Improvements

  • Reduce initial polling delay for iSpring, Rise 360, and Captivate vendor detectors from 4s to 2s for faster position bar updates

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.85: Fix resume correction suspend_data in LMSInitialize wrapper
  • v2.0.84: Fix Captivate position bar bugs (Generic 0-based misread)
  • v2.0.83: Refactor tracking_js.php into modular class files by SCORM vendor
